overview.en: The electrocardiogram (ECG) is the cornerstone diagnostic tool for cardiac arrhythmias. Mastery requires understanding basic ECG components and intervals, followed by a systematic approach to rhythm interpretation. This foundation enables accurate diagnosis and appropriate treatment selection.
overview.zh: 心電圖（ECG）是診斷心律不整的基石工具。精通 ECG 需要理解基本的 ECG 組成與間期，並運用系統性的節律判讀方法。此基礎使得準確診斷與適當治療選擇成為可能。

title.zh: 基本 ECG 組成與間期

normal_characteristics.en: Upright in leads I, II, aVF; duration < 120 ms; amplitude < 2.5 mm
normal_characteristics.zh: 在 I、II、aVF 導程為正向；時間 < 120 ms；振幅 < 2.5 mm

clinical_relevance.en: Absent in AF; abnormal morphology indicates atrial enlargement; inverted P waves suggest ectopic atrial focus or retrograde conduction
clinical_relevance.zh: 心房顫動時消失；形態異常提示心房擴大；倒置 P 波提示異位心房起搏點或逆行傳導

represents.en: AV nodal conduction delay (isoelectric period from end of P to start of QRS)
represents.zh: AV 結傳導延遲（從 P 波結束到 QRS 起始的等電位期）

clinical_relevance.en: Allows atrial contraction to complete before ventricular filling
clinical_relevance.zh: 讓心房收縮在心室填充前完成

clinical_relevance.en: Wide QRS (≥ 120 ms) seen in: bundle branch block, hyperkalemia, Na⁺ channel blocker toxicity, ventricular origin rhythms, pre-excitation (WPW)
clinical_relevance.zh: 寬 QRS（≥ 120 ms）見於：束支傳導阻滯、高血鉀、Na⁺ 通道阻斷劑毒性、心室起源節律、預激（WPW）

represents.en: Early ventricular repolarization (isoelectric period from end of QRS to start of T)
represents.zh: 早期心室再極化（從 QRS 結束到 T 波起始的等電位期）

clinical_relevance.en: Elevation indicates acute MI (STEMI) or pericarditis; depression indicates ischemia or reciprocal changes
clinical_relevance.zh: 抬高提示急性心肌梗塞（STEMI）或心包膜炎；壓低提示缺血或對應性改變

normal_characteristics.en: Upright in most leads; inverted in aVR; variable in III, aVL, V1
normal_characteristics.zh: 大多數導程為正向；aVR 導程為倒置；III、aVL、V1 可變化

clinical_relevance.en: Peaked T waves suggest hyperkalemia; inverted T waves indicate ischemia; T wave changes seen in electrolyte abnormalities
clinical_relevance.zh: 尖峰 T 波提示高血鉀；倒置 T 波提示缺血；電解質異常會造成 T 波改變

represents.en: Late repolarization (possibly Purkinje fibers or M cells)
represents.zh: 晚期再極化（可能為浦金氏纖維或 M 細胞）

normal_characteristics.en: Small positive deflection after T wave; most prominent in V2-V4
normal_characteristics.zh: T 波後的小正向偏折；在 V2-V4 最明顯

clinical_relevance.en: Prominent U waves suggest hypokalemia; may be seen with bradycardia
clinical_relevance.zh: 明顯的 U 波提示低血鉀；可見於心搏過緩

measures.en: Atria → AV node → ventricles conduction time (P wave onset to QRS onset)
measures.zh: 心房 → AV 結 → 心室傳導時間（P 波起始至 QRS 起始）

prolonged_by.en: Beta-blockers, CCBs (verapamil, diltiazem), digoxin, amiodarone, 1st degree AV block
prolonged_by.zh: β 阻斷劑、CCBs（verapamil、diltiazem）、digoxin、amiodarone、第一度 AV 阻滯

clinical_consequence.en: Prolonged PR (> 200 ms) = 1st degree AV block; shortened PR (< 120 ms) with delta wave = WPW
clinical_consequence.zh: PR 延長（> 200 ms）= 第一度 AV 阻滯；PR 縮短（< 120 ms）合併 delta 波 = WPW

prolonged_by.en: Class IC agents (flecainide, propafenone), TCAs, severe hyperkalemia, bundle branch block
prolonged_by.zh: IC 類藥物（flecainide、propafenone）、三環抗憂鬱劑、嚴重高血鉀、束支傳導阻滯

clinical_consequence.en: Widened QRS indicates conduction delay or ventricular origin; increases risk of VT in structural heart disease
clinical_consequence.zh: QRS 變寬表示傳導延遲或心室起源；在結構性心臟病中增加 VT 風險

measures.zh: 總心室電氣活動（去極化 + 再極化）

normal_value.en: Heart rate-dependent; must use corrected QT (QTc)
normal_value.zh: 與心率相關；須使用校正 QT（QTc）

calculation.en: Bazett formula: QTc = QT ÷ √RR (RR in seconds)
calculation.zh: Bazett 公式：QTc = QT ÷ √RR（RR 以秒為單位）

prolonged_by.en: Antipsychotics, fluoroquinolones, macrolides, antiarrhythmics (Class Ia, III), antiemetics, hypokalemia, hypomagnesemia, hypocalcemia
prolonged_by.zh: 抗精神病藥、氟喹諾酮類、大環內酯類、抗心律不整藥（Ia 類、III 類）、止吐藥、低血鉀、低血鎂、低血鈣

clinical_consequence.en: Prolonged QTc increases Torsades de Pointes risk; risk significantly elevated when QTc > 500 ms
clinical_consequence.zh: QTc 延長增加尖端扭轉型心室頻脈風險；QTc > 500 ms 時風險顯著升高

measures.en: QT interval corrected for heart rate
measures.zh: 經心率校正的 QT 間期

normal_value.en: < 450 ms (men), < 460 ms (women); some guidelines use < 470 ms for women
normal_value.zh: < 450 ms（男性）、< 460 ms（女性）；部分指引對女性使用 < 470 ms

clinical_consequence.en: QTc > 500 ms = high risk for Torsades de Pointes; triggers immediate review of QT-prolonging medications
clinical_consequence.zh: QTc > 500 ms = 尖端扭轉型心室頻脈高風險；應立即檢視延長 QT 的藥物

title.en: Systematic Approach to Reading an ECG: The R-R-P-Q-I Method
title.zh: 系統性 ECG 判讀方法：R-R-P-Q-I 法

description.en: A systematic approach ensures no critical findings are missed. The R-R-P-Q-I method provides a structured framework: Rate → Rhythm → P waves → QRS width → Intervals.
description.zh: 系統性方法確保不遺漏任何關鍵發現。R-R-P-Q-I 方法提供結構化框架：Rate（心率）→ Rhythm（節律）→ P waves（P 波）→ QRS width（QRS 寬度）→ Intervals（間期）。

method.zh: 方法一：規則節律（300 法則）

technique.en: Count large boxes between two R waves; divide 300 by that number
technique.zh: 計算兩個 R 波之間的大格數；用 300 除以該數字

method.zh: 方法二：不規則節律（6 秒法）

technique.en: Count QRS complexes in 6 seconds (30 large boxes) and multiply by 10
technique.zh: 計算 6 秒內（30 大格）的 QRS 波群數量並乘以 10
檢視 R-R 間距的規則性

common_rhythms.en: Sinus rhythm, SVT (AVNRT, AVRT), atrial flutter with fixed block, VT
common_rhythms.zh: 竇性節律、SVT（AVNRT、AVRT）、固定傳導比的心房撲動、VT

description.en: R-R intervals vary without any pattern
description.zh: R-R 間距變化無任何規律
不規則性有可預測的模式

common_rhythms.en: 2nd degree AV block (Mobitz I), PACs/PVCs in bigeminy
common_rhythms.zh: 第二度 AV 阻滯（Mobitz I）、雙聯 PACs/PVCs

name.zh: 步驟三：檢視 P 波

assessment.en: Is there a P wave before every QRS?
assessment.zh: 每個 QRS 前是否都有 P 波？

interpretation.en: Absent P waves: AF, junctional rhythm, or ventricular rhythm
interpretation.zh: P 波消失：AF、交界性節律或心室節律

assessment.en: Is P wave upright in lead II? (indicates normal sinus origin)
assessment.zh: P 波在 II 導程是否正向？（表示正常竇性起源）

interpretation.en: Inverted P in II: ectopic atrial rhythm or retrograde conduction
interpretation.zh: II 導程 P 波倒置：異位心房節律或逆行傳導

assessment.en: Is P wave morphology the same throughout?
assessment.zh: P 波形態是否全程一致？

interpretation.en: Variable P morphology: wandering atrial pacemaker or multifocal atrial tachycardia (MAT)
interpretation.zh: P 波形態變化：遊走性心房起搏點或多源性心房頻脈（MAT）

name.zh: 步驟四：測量 QRS 寬度

interpretation.en: Supraventricular origin — impulse travels normally through His-Purkinje system
interpretation.zh: 心室上起源 — 電訊號經 His-Purkinje 系統正常傳導

interpretation.en: Ventricular origin OR supraventricular with aberrancy/pre-excitation
interpretation.zh: 心室起源或心室上起源合併傳導異常/預激

clinical_rule.en: ASSUME VT until proven otherwise (safer approach for wide complex tachycardia)
clinical_rule.zh: 假設為 VT 直到證明為其他（對寬 QRS 波心搏過速較安全的作法）

measures.zh: P 波起始 → QRS 起始

assess_for.en: AV conduction — prolonged suggests AV block; shortened with delta wave suggests pre-excitation
assess_for.zh: AV 傳導 — 延長提示 AV 阻滯；縮短合併 delta 波提示預激

measures.zh: QRS 起始 → T 波結束

assess_for.en: Repolarization — prolonged QTc increases Torsades risk; important for drug safety monitoring
assess_for.zh: 再極化 — QTc 延長增加 Torsades 風險；對藥物安全監測很重要

ecg_finding.en: Narrow QRS, regular, no visible P
ecg_finding.zh: 窄 QRS、規則、P 波不可見

likely_arrhythmia.zh: 房室結折返性心動過速（AVNRT）

key_features.en: P buried in QRS; rate 150-250 bpm; pseudo r' in V1 or pseudo S in inferior leads
key_features.zh: P 波埋在 QRS 中；心率 150-250 bpm；V1 可見偽 r' 波或下壁導程可見偽 S 波

ecg_finding.zh: 窄 QRS、規則、逆行 P 波

key_features.en: P wave after QRS; possible delta wave on baseline ECG (WPW); RP interval > 70 ms
key_features.zh: P 波在 QRS 後方；基礎 ECG 可能有 delta 波（WPW）；RP 間期 > 70 ms

ecg_finding.en: Narrow QRS, irregularly irregular, no P
ecg_finding.zh: 窄 QRS、絕對不規則、無 P 波

key_features.en: Chaotic fibrillatory baseline; completely variable R-R intervals; no identifiable P waves
key_features.zh: 混亂的顫動基線；R-R 間距完全不規則；無法辨識的 P 波

key_features.en: Flutter waves (F waves) at 250-350/min; typically 2:1 block → ventricular rate ~150 bpm; variable rate possible
key_features.zh: 撲動波（F 波）頻率 250-350/min；典型 2:1 傳導 → 心室率約 150 bpm；可有變動傳導比

likely_arrhythmia.zh: VT 或 SVT 合併傳導異常

key_features.en: ASSUME VT (safer); AV dissociation, fusion/capture beats favor VT; Brugada criteria help differentiate
key_features.zh: 假設為 VT（較安全）；AV 分離、融合波/擷取波支持 VT；Brugada 準則協助鑑別

ecg_finding.zh: 寬 QRS、不規則、形態多變

key_features.en: DANGER — Avoid AV nodal blockers (adenosine, verapamil, diltiazem, digoxin, beta-blockers); may degenerate to VF
key_features.zh: 危險 — 禁用 AV 結阻斷劑（adenosine、verapamil、diltiazem、digoxin、β 阻斷劑）；可能惡化為 VF

key_features.en: P before every QRS; PR interval normal (120-200 ms); physiological in athletes or during sleep
key_features.zh: 每個 QRS 前都有 P 波；PR 間期正常（120-200 ms）；運動員或睡眠時可為生理性

ecg_finding.en: Prolonged PR (> 200 ms), all P conducted
ecg_finding.zh: PR 延長（> 200 ms）、所有 P 波均傳導

key_features.en: Benign; monitor for drug causes (beta-blockers, CCBs, digoxin, amiodarone); no dropped beats
key_features.zh: 良性；監測藥物原因（β 阻斷劑、CCBs、digoxin、amiodarone）；無 QRS 脫落

ecg_finding.zh: PR 逐漸延長 → QRS 脫落

key_features.en: Often benign; commonly vagal tone or drug-induced; grouped beating; R-R intervals progressively shorten before pause
key_features.zh: 通常良性；常為迷走神經張力或藥物引起；心搏成組；暫停前 R-R 間距逐漸縮短

ecg_finding.en: Constant PR with intermittent dropped QRS
ecg_finding.zh: PR 固定但間歇性 QRS 脫落

key_features.en: More serious; infranodal block; risk of progression to complete heart block; often requires pacemaker
key_features.zh: 較嚴重；結下阻滯；有進展為完全心臟阻滯的風險；通常需要起搏器

ecg_finding.en: P and QRS dissociated, slow ventricular rate
ecg_finding.zh: P 波與 QRS 分離、心室率慢

key_features.en: Atria and ventricles beat independently (AV dissociation); escape rhythm determines rate; often requires permanent pacemaker
key_features.zh: 心房與心室獨立跳動（AV 分離）；逸搏節律決定心率；通常需要永久性起搏器

ecg_finding.en: No P waves, slow irregularly irregular rhythm
ecg_finding.zh: 無 P 波、慢且絕對不規則節律

key_features.en: Assess for drug toxicity (digoxin, beta-blockers, CCBs); may indicate AV node disease or excessive rate control
key_features.zh: 評估藥物毒性（digoxin、β 阻斷劑、CCBs）；可能表示 AV 結疾病或過度心率控制

ecg_finding.en: No P waves, slow regular rhythm
ecg_finding.zh: 無 P 波、慢且規則節律

key_features.en: Rate 40-60 bpm; assess for drug toxicity; may occur with SA node dysfunction
key_features.zh: 心率 40-60 bpm；評估藥物毒性；可發生於竇房結功能異常
